pkgmetadata.longdescription: CENTIPEDE learns a DNaseI footprint of a transcription factor and predicts its binding sites // Centipede fits a bayesian hierarchical mixture model to learn TF-specific distribution of experimental data on a particular cell-type for a set of candidate binding sites described by a motif. More documentation is under preparation and will be make available soon at http://centipede.uchicago.edu
